introduction.title: Who are we?
desc: For nearly ten years, we have been organizing weddings and various events to provide you and your guests with an unforgettable experience!
With a rich selection in our wedding venue, unique organization, and attentive hospitality, we await your dream event.
Our experienced team and our 170-seat restaurant provide full service, while we offer comfortable accommodation for our guests with 23+2 beds in 6 rooms for the big event.
In our green area, there is the opportunity to organize civil weddings outdoors (with a registrar).
Our parking lot provides space for 200 vehicles with security guard supervision.
Additionally, various outdoor activities are available for our guests, such as a children's playground, sports field, lakes, lookout tower, and countryside inn, offering relaxation.

hostel.title: Hostel
desc: We offer five rooms for our guests with a total of 21 beds. Each of our rooms is triple, with a double bed, a single bed, and a pull-out sofa, ensuring maximum comfort.
The rooms offer beautiful views of the lakes and the surroundings, equipped with underfloor heating, private bathroom, and free Wi-Fi.
Our room capacities are as follows: 1. - 7 people, 2. - 4 people, 3. - 4 people, 4. - 3 people, 5. - 3 people.
Upon prior arrangement, we provide breakfast, lunch, and dinner for our guests in our restaurant. Pets are also welcome in our accommodations.
